title: No, That’s Not Kapil Mishra’s Sister Marrying a Muslim Man
subtitle: Fact Check of BJP Leader Kapil Mishra’s Sister Marrying a Muslim | Image of a couple in wedding attire is being shared with a claim that the woman in the photograph is BJP leader Kapil Mishra’s sister who married a Muslim boy.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Image of a couple in wedding attire is being shared with a claim that the woman in the photograph is Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) leader Kapil Mishra’s sister who married a Muslim man.

However, we found that the image is as old as 2016 and shows a couple from Karnataka who had an interfaith marriage.
